SENT.plain: There are many documented cases of Klippel-Trenaunay-Weber syndrome characterized by the triad of port wine stain, varicose veins, and hypertrophy of bones and overlying tissue
A few cases have even included the additional findings of hemimegalencephaly
We report a case of Klippel-Trenaunay-Weber syndrome with hemimegalencephaly and calvarial hypertrophy, but no evidence of limb or trunk hypertrophy
